p: Furthermore, cytotoxic studies of cycloschimperols A ( 49); [cycloart-20,24-dien-3β-ol], B ( 50); [26–27-dinor-3β-hydroxycycloartan-25-al], 24-methylenecycloartane and cycloart-25-en-3-one ( 53) against similar cell lines (MCF-7, HepG2, HCT-116) was conducted by Mohamed et al. [ 67]. The results revealed that cycloschimperols B ( 50) recorded the highest activity with an IC50 value of 0.60 μM, while cycloart-25-en-3-one ( 53) had the lowest activity with an IC50 value of 0.20 μM in comparison to doxorubicin as the standard [ 67].
